page.title: 19PASTIMES IN ULLAPOOL.
page.content: If you are a football fan and don't especially want to play,you can go along to the football pitch on a Saturday afternoon to see local teams playing in what is called a 'Derby'. The Recreation Park has tennis courts which can be hired out by the hour. Because we have no swimming pool we use a lovely spot down by the Ullapool River. In the Community Centre and some of the hotels we have Pool and table- tennis tables. We have a paddling pool down by the 'Old Jetty'beside a park called' Am Pollam'(The Anchorage). Darts are played in the winter time. Several teams participate from a league table and cups or shields are presented to the winning teams.
